economyVsScience.description: The intersection between economic models and scientific paradigms

questioningPhysics.title: Questioning Physics
questioningPhysics.description: Critical analysis of physical foundations from economic perspectives

conferences.title: Conferences
conferences.subtitle: Events and presentations on Economic Heresy

author.title: Author Presentation
author.description: Biography and trajectory of the author

kit2.title: Kit2 Explanation
kit2.subtitle: Modernized Kit2 system for CHE content distribution
kit2.description: The Kit2 system is a CHE innovation for viral distribution of educational content with a commission model that benefits the entire distribution chain.

account.title: My Account
account.developmentNote: Functionality in development - Enterprise authentication system coming soon.
account.kit2sDescription: Manage your active and expired Kit2s

funds.title: The 11 CHE Rotating Funds
funds.subtitle: Statutory structure of the Economic Heresy Corporation for global development

inversionEmpresarial.title: Business Investment - CHE Free World
inversionEmpresarial.description: Investment and entrepreneurship projects for economic development.

objective.title: Fund Objective
objective.content: Facilitate access to investment capital for entrepreneurs and companies seeking to expand their operations or develop new innovative projects.

process.title: Participation Process
process.content: Interested parties can submit their investment proposals through our online portal, where they will be evaluated by our team of experts.

editorialMedios.title: Editorial & Audiovisual Media - CHE Free World
editorialMedios.description: Development of editorial content and audiovisual media for CHE knowledge dissemination.

objective.title: Fund Objective
objective.content: Create and distribute educational content, books, videos and audiovisual materials that promote Economic Heresy principles globally.

process.title: Participation Process
process.content: Authors, creators and producers can submit their content proposals through our specialized portal.

sanacionEmocional.title: Emotional Healing - CHE Free World
sanacionEmocional.description: Emotional wellness and comprehensive healing programs for personal development.

objective.title: Fund Objective
objective.content: Provide emotional healing services, alternative therapies and wellness programs that promote integral human development.

process.title: Participation Process
process.content: Interested individuals can access our healing services through scheduled appointments and specialized programs.

vivienda.title: Housing - CHE Free World
vivienda.description: Innovative and accessible housing solutions for global communities.

objective.title: Fund Objective
objective.content: Develop accessible, sustainable and innovative housing projects that guarantee the right to dignified housing for all.

process.title: Participation Process
process.content: Families and communities can apply to our housing programs through our comprehensive evaluation system.

recreacionSocial.title: Social & Hotel Recreation - CHE Free World
recreacionSocial.description: Tourism, recreation and hotel services projects for social development.

objective.title: Fund Objective
objective.content: Create recreation spaces, community tourism and hotel services that generate local economic development and social welfare.

process.title: Participation Process
process.content: Communities and tourism entrepreneurs can present proposals for sustainable recreational and hotel projects.

sistemasPlatformas.title: Systems & Platforms - CHE Free World
sistemasPlatformas.description: Development of innovative technologies and digital platforms.

objective.title: Fund Objective
objective.content: Create technological systems, digital platforms and IT solutions that facilitate CHE principles implementation.

process.title: Participation Process
process.content: Developers and tech companies can propose innovative solutions through our technology incubation program.

bancario.title: Banking - CHE Free World
bancario.description: Alternative financial services and community banking.

objective.title: Fund Objective
objective.content: Establish alternative banking services, microfinance and community financial systems that democratize capital access.

process.title: Participation Process
process.content: Individuals and communities can access our alternative banking services through our cooperative membership system.

ingenieria.title: Engineering Projects - CHE Free World
ingenieria.description: Infrastructure and engineering projects for sustainable development.

objective.title: Fund Objective
objective.content: Develop infrastructure, civil and environmental engineering projects that improve quality of life and promote sustainable development.

process.title: Participation Process
process.content: Engineers and construction companies can participate in our bidding processes for community infrastructure projects.

comercial.title: Commercial - CHE Free World
comercial.description: Commercial and business activities under CHE principles.

objective.title: Fund Objective
objective.content: Promote ethical commercial activities, fair trade and businesses operating under Economic Heresy principles.

process.title: Participation Process
process.content: Companies and merchants can obtain CHE certification through our ethical business practices evaluation program.

investigacionCientifica.title: Scientific Research - CHE Free World
investigacionCientifica.description: Scientific research and innovative knowledge development.

objective.title: Fund Objective
objective.content: Finance independent scientific research, alternative economic studies and knowledge development that challenges established paradigms.

process.title: Participation Process
process.content: Researchers and academic institutions can apply to our research funds through our scientific evaluation system.

arteCultura.title: Art & Culture - CHE Free World
arteCultura.description: Artistic manifestations and transformative cultural projects.

objective.title: Fund Objective
objective.content: Promote artistic expressions, cultural projects and creative manifestations that disseminate Economic Heresy values and principles.

process.title: Participation Process
process.content: Artists and cultural managers can request support for their creative projects through our artistic scholarship program.

development.banner: This project is in development phase. Some sections might be incomplete.
